attributes.action: Give drug dealers COVID bonus lesser sentencing during the COVID 19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Give drug dealers lesser sentencing during this covid 19 pandemic with all these restrictions as they are locked up for 23 hours don’t get time enough time to be out and have fresh air they don’t get calls so please give them lesser sentencing as a covid 19 bonus as they don’t get no visits at all and don’t know how ever long this is going to go for
attributes.background: They should give drug dealers lesser sentencing and a COVID bonus during the COVID 19 pandemic as they can’t get visits lesser phone calls as they are not allowed to be out for 23 hours it ain’t fair on them and their families

rejection.details:
Decisions about sentencing are a matter for the courts, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Enable early release of prisoners who have been in lockdown due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331465
